post.author: 이계영
post.content:
Contract: 6 Months+ MUST HAVE JBOSS OR WEBLOGIC VERSION 10 Overview: Design, develop, and implement software applications on a 24X7 web based client facing application.
Responsibilities: Develop detailed program specifications Unit test code. Develop and maintain application code Participate in integration and regression testing Prepare technical documentation. Implement security policies
Interpersonal and Technical Skills Must have excellent verbal and written communication skills in English. Must be a good team player with positive attitude. Self-starter with the ability to learn quickly, has good problem-solving skills and can meet tight deadlines
Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or a related discipline At least 8 years of experience in systems development with 5+ years in Internet environment. Excellent front end and backend development skills. Experience developing client facing, W3C standards compliant, web applications supporting multiple browsers and operating systems. Strong knowledge of concepts, practices and procedures of systems development life cycle. Relies on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals. Excellent technical skills and experience with the environments and tools identified below. Systems Environment: Multi-tier web based solutions, wide variety of hardware and operating systems (Linux, AIX, Windows, etc), Oracle, and MS SQL, Agile and RUP (development methodology), Rational suite of products to manage development life cycle, Replication Server Technology, Remedy, Spectrum, Patrol, Networking fundamentals, PKI, Intrusion Detection, X.500 Directory
Development Environment and Tools: Java, J2EE, Spring, hibernate, JDBC, SOA, XSLT, FLEX, JSON, CSS, XML, HTML, Debugging tools, application servers(Weblogic, JBOSS), Apache, Linux, scripting tools and languages, Oracle, Eclipse, ClearCase, ClearQuest, UML, Knowledge of modeling tools. Hailstorm for vulnerability testing and Fortify for code security scanning. Dale Borrmann, Technical Recruiter Eagle Professional Resources Inc. W: (416) 861-1492 ext 2275 Toll free: (888)-999-7311
post.title: Senior Java Developer
